title: Schiff & The Dems Implode Again (Ep 1076)
description:
In this episode, I address the explosive hearing on Capitol Hill yesterday where the hapless Democrats completely humiliated themselves. I also address John Solomon’s revealing new piece which blows up Joe Biden’s nonsense. News Picks:



John Solomon’s latest blockbuster piece exposes Biden’s lies.


More information on the deep-state leaker the media refers to as the “whistleblower.”


Sleazy Adam Schiff literally made up quotes at the DNI hearing yesterday.


Is this what the Democrats are really afraid of regarding Ukraine and Pinchuk? 

Census shows the highest level of foreign-born US residents in over a half a century. 

Is “The Donald” being silenced by Reddit?


This liberal newspaper is facing tremendous backlash for attacking a man raising money for charity. 

The latest impeachment push by the deranged Democrats is already backfiring. Look at these poll numbers.

Here’s a copy of the letter the phony Democrats sent to Ukraine demanding an investigation into Trump.
